The editorial board of Investor: s Business Daily claims that "Cap-and-trade is wildly unpopular with Americans."
The board cites a June 28: 29 Rasmussen poll that shows 56 percent of Americans wouldn't pay more taxes to cut greenhouse gases, implying opposition to cap-and-trade.
A Washington Post: ABC News survey published on June 25 shows that 52 percent of Americans support a cap-and-trade program to regulate greenhouse gas emissions.
A Zogby poll published on Aug: 11 found that 71 percent of Americans support the cap-and-trade legislation passed in the House.
